org.apache.giraph.io

接口 GiraphInputFormat

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AdjacencyListTextVertexInputFormat, EdgeInputFormat, GeneratedVertexInputFormat, InMemoryVertexInputFormat, IntIntNullTextInputFormat, IntIntTextVertexValueInputFormat, IntNullNullTextInputFormat, IntNullReverseTextEdgeInputFormat, IntNullTextEdgeInputFormat, JsonBase64VertexInputFormat, JsonLongDoubleFloatDoubleVertexInputFormat, LongDoubleDoubleAdjacencyListVertexInputFormat, LongDoubleDoubleTextInputFormat, LongDoubleNullTextInputFormat, NormalizingLongDoubleDoubleTextInputFormat, PseudoRandomEdgeInputFormat, PseudoRandomIntNullVertexInputFormat, PseudoRandomVertexInputFormat, SequenceFileVertexInputFormat, SimplePageRankVertex.SimplePageRankVertexInputFormat, SimpleSuperstepVertex.SimpleSuperstepVertexInputFormat, TextDoubleDoubleAdjacencyListVertexInputFormat, TextEdgeInputFormat, TextVertexInputFormat, TextVertexValueInputFormat, VertexInputFormat, VertexValueInputFormat

    public interface GiraphInputFormat
    Common interface for VertexInputFormat and EdgeInputFormat.

      Get the list of input splits for the format.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getSplits

        List<org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit> getSplits(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext context,
                                                     int minSplitCountHint)
                                                       throws IOException,
                                                              InterruptedException
        Get the list of input splits for the format.
        参数:
        context - The job context
        minSplitCountHint - Minimum number of splits to create (hint)
        返回:
        The list of input splits
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
